bathroom: A cheeky bubble bath sounds perfect!
garden: Ah, tulips. Remind you of anything?
stables: Come on, handsome... The horses aren't going to talk.

dungeon: I don't think Father would approve.
This place reminds of my husband... I am no longer in the mood.
master-bedroom: And roll in my husband's filth? I don't think so.

stable-boy: Oh, you take my breath away...

lord: Get away from me you loathesome man...
